CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Berry Corp (bry) is a western United States independent upstream energy company with a focus on the conventional, long-lived oil reserves in the San Joaquin basin of California. The business activities of the group include development and production of conventional oil reserves.
